metadata.description: UX Feature Flags for PlayerARC/PDP Platform

flags.name: Mobile bottom navigation
flags.description: Adds persistent bottom navigation bar on mobile devices

flags.name: Grouped admin sidebar
flags.description: Replaces 16 horizontal tabs with 4 collapsible groups in Admin Panel

flags.name: Bottom sheet admin nav
flags.description: Opens admin sections in a bottom sheet on mobile

flags.name: Tabs admin nav
flags.description: Uses horizontally scrollable tabs for admin navigation

flags.name: 44px touch targets
flags.description: Enforces minimum 44px touch targets (Apple/Google standard)

flags.name: AppShell responsive layout
flags.description: Uses new AppShell wrapper for responsive authenticated pages

flags.name: Desktop hover-reveal actions
flags.description: Shows action buttons on row/card hover (desktop only)

flags.name: Responsive input/select sizing
flags.description: 48px inputs on mobile, 40px on desktop

flags.name: Card-based mobile display
flags.description: Uses cards instead of tables for data on mobile

flags.name: Skeleton loading states
flags.description: Shows skeleton UI while content loads

flags.name: Mobile-optimized forms
flags.description: Forms with 48px inputs, sticky submit, keyboard shortcuts

flags.name: Command palette (Cmd+K)
flags.description: Global search and navigation via keyboard shortcut

flags.name: Responsive dialogs
flags.description: Bottom sheet on mobile, centered modal on desktop

flags.name: Keyboard shortcuts help
flags.description: Press ? to show all keyboard shortcuts (desktop only)

flags.name: Density toggle
flags.description: Compact/comfortable/spacious density options

flags.name: Offline status indicator
flags.description: Shows banner when offline, reconnected when back online

flags.name: PWA install prompt
flags.description: Shows install prompt after multiple visits

flags.name: Resizable sidebar
flags.description: Sidebar with drag handle to resize

flags.name: Pinned favorites
flags.description: Pin frequently used items to sidebar

flags.name: Recent items history
flags.description: Shows recently accessed items

flags.name: Enhanced table features
flags.description: Column visibility, bulk actions, export functionality

flags.name: Swipe actions on cards
flags.description: Swipe to reveal edit/delete actions on mobile

flags.name: Pull to refresh on lists
flags.description: Pull down to refresh data lists

flags.name: Context menus
flags.description: Long-press on mobile, right-click on desktop

flags.name: Action sheets
flags.description: Bottom sheet on mobile, dropdown on desktop

flags.name: Inline editing
flags.description: Modal on mobile, in-place editing on desktop

flags.name: Service worker registration
flags.description: Enables PWA capabilities and caching

flags.name: Offline support features
flags.description: Queue actions when offline, sync when back

flags.name: PWA update prompt
flags.description: Shows prompt when new version available

flags.name: Skip to main content links
flags.description: Accessibility skip links for keyboard users

flags.name: Enhanced focus indicators
flags.description: Clear visible focus states for keyboard navigation

flags.name: Reduced motion support
flags.description: Respects prefers-reduced-motion preference

flags.name: Screen reader announcements
flags.description: Live region announcements for dynamic content

flags.name: Lazy loading components
flags.description: Load components on demand to improve performance

flags.name: Web Vitals monitoring
flags.description: Track Core Web Vitals metrics

flags.name: Deferred rendering
flags.description: Defer non-critical rendering for faster initial load

flags.name: Resource hints (preconnect)
flags.description: Preconnect and prefetch for faster navigation

flags.name: Enhanced theme toggle
flags.description: Theme toggle with checkmark indicator, ARIA attributes, icons

flags.name: Auto-contrast text colors
flags.description: Automatically picks black or white text based on org background color luminance (WCAG compliant)

flags.name: Dark mode color adaptation
flags.description: Lightens dark org colors in dark mode for better visibility
